name: PartyGameCollection_prototype
description:
This is the prototype of a minigame-collection party game, which has some similarity to Mario Party or Warioware.

The goal of the game is to have fun playing the minigames, unlock new games, and challenge the player in many different ways.

It was made in Game Maker Studio 1 Professional.

If there will be a full version, is written in the stars ***

Please enjoy :)
